Achievements.Name: Deliver Us From Evil
Achievements.Description: Liberate 12 Outposts (Campaign only).

Achievements.Name: All Clear
Achievements.Description: Liberate all Outposts (Campaign only).

Achievements.Name: Tread Lightly
Achievements.Description: Liberate any Outpost without triggering an alarm in any mode (Campaign only).

Achievements.Name: End Transmission
Achievements.Description: Liberate 8 Bell Towers (Campaign only).

Achievements.Name: Display Of Fortitude
Achievements.Description: Conquer 2 Fortresses (Campaign only).

Achievements.Name: Well-Rounded
Achievements.Description: Complete any 6 Hunting quests (Supplies, Control, Survival) (Campaign only).

Achievements.Name: Trigger-Man
Achievements.Description: Complete 3 Assassination or Eye for an Eye quests (Campaign only).

Achievements.Name: No One Left Behind
Achievements.Description: Rescue 15 hostages in Hostage Rescue quests (Campaign only).

Achievements.Name: Gearhead
Achievements.Description: Complete 3 Kyrati Films: Racing or Kyrati Films: Survival activities (Campaign only).

Achievements.Name: Defender
Achievements.Description: Repel 3 Outpost Retaliation Parties (Campaign only).

Achievements.Name: Robin Hood
Achievements.Description: Hijack 3 Royal Cargo Trucks and return them to a liberated Outpost (Campaign only).

Achievements.Name: Hand Of Justice
Achievements.Description: Eliminate 3 Pagan's Wrath convoys (Campaign only).

Achievements.Name: Brother In Arms
Achievements.Description: Liberate 1 Outpost playing as Hurk (Campaign Co-op only).

Achievements.Name: Defuser
Achievements.Description: Complete 3 Bomb Defusal quests (Campaign only).

Achievements.Name: Changing Lanes
Achievements.Description: Perform a Vehicle Takedown from the passenger seat of a vehicle (Campaign Co-op only).

Achievements.Name: Fixer-Upper
Achievements.Description: Purchase 3 items for the Ghale Homestead (Campaign only).

Achievements.Name: Exorcist
Achievements.Description: Recover or destroy 15 Masks of Yalung (Campaign only).

Achievements.Name: Rewriting History
Achievements.Description: Remove 30 Propaganda Posters (Campaign only).

Achievements.Name: Caretaker Of Memory
Achievements.Description: Find 10 Lost Letters (Campaign only).

Achievements.Name: Right Tributes
Achievements.Description: Spin 10 Mani Wheels (Campaign only).

Achievements.Name: The Rarest Game
Achievements.Description: Complete 3 Kyrat Fashion Week quests (Campaign only).

Achievements.Name: Well Read
Achievements.Description: Read 10 notes (Campaign only).

Achievements.Name: Quick Learner
Achievements.Description: Learn 10 skills (Campaign only).

Achievements.Name: Fully Loaded
Achievements.Description: Learn all skills (Campaign only).

Achievements.Name: Tricked Out
Achievements.Description: Craft 5 upgrades for your equipment (Campaign only).

Achievements.Name: Dr. Feelgood
Achievements.Description: Craft 15 syringes (Campaign only).

Achievements.Name: Make It Rain
Achievements.Description: Spend 500,000 rupees total at Trading Posts (Campaign only).

Achievements.Name: Custom-Fitted
Achievements.Description: Buy all attachments and paint schemes for a single weapon (Campaign only).

Achievements.Name: Tusker
Achievements.Description: Kill 30 enemies with an elephant (Campaign only).

Achievements.Name: Quad Kill
Achievements.Description: Kill 4 enemies simultaneously with a single explosion (Campaign only).

Achievements.Name: Misdirection
Achievements.Description: Distract 15 enemies with rocks (Campaign only).

Achievements.Name: Shutterbug
Achievements.Description: Tag 25 enemies using the camera (Campaign only).

Achievements.Name: Reign Of Death
Achievements.Description: Kill 30 enemies with Mortar rounds (Campaign only).

Achievements.Name: From A Distance
Achievements.Description: Kill a target from 60m or more with an arrow or bolt (Campaign only).

Achievements.Name: Two Birds
Achievements.Description: Using a sniper rifle, kill 2 targets with a single shot (Campaign only).

Achievements.Name: The Sky Is Falling
Achievements.Description: Perform a takedown from a Buzzer (Campaign only).

Achievements.Name: Flame On!
Achievements.Description: Kill 50 enemies with fire (Campaign only).

Achievements.Name: Drive-By
Achievements.Description: Kill 25 enemies while shooting and driving (Campaign only).

Achievements.Name: The Good Fight
Achievements.Description: Reach Karma Level 2, and purchase any Guns For Hire upgrade (Campaign only).

Achievements.Name: Like A Bird
Achievements.Description: Fly 5000m total in the Wingsuit (Campaign only).

Achievements.Name: Roadkill
Achievements.Description: Run over 25 people (Campaign only).

Achievements.Name: The People's Champ
Achievements.Description: Reach Arena Rank 5 (Campaign Arena only).

Achievements.Name: Renaissance Man
Achievements.Description: Finish a public match of each game type in the Battles of Kyrat game mode (Battles of Kyrat only).

Achievements.Name: Community Surprise
Achievements.Description: Play a Top Rated map in the Map Browser (Map Browser only).

Achievements.Name: Welcome to Kyrat
Achievements.Description: Join the Golden Path (Campaign only).

Achievements.Name: One Down
Achievements.Description: Decide De Pleur's fate (Campaign only).

Achievements.Name: Overdose
Achievements.Description: Discover Shangri-La (Campaign only).

Achievements.Name: Two Down
Achievements.Description: Decide Noore's fate (Campaign only).

Achievements.Name: Hat-Trick
Achievements.Description: Decide Yuma's fate (Campaign only).

Achievements.Name: The King Is Dead
Achievements.Description: Decide Pagan Min's fate (Campaign only).
